name: All Fired Up

Bring the items above in the form of the first 20 logs, a hatchet for cutting the other 20 logs from the normal trees between the beacons, and 5 logs of any type to relight the first beacon, along with the required tinderbox.
Equipping a Seer's Headband can speed this already short quest up considerably.
Any weight reducing items can help since carrying the logs will slow you down. Additionally, an Explorer's ring can help recharge energy.

You can also use the salt-water spring in Oo'glog or the Anachronia base camp for a temporary and unlimited run energy boost
Or, an Ogre flask (salt water)
Varrock teleport runes

Ardougne Teleport (if Plague City completed) or access to Ardougne or Yanille lodestone for convenience.

A weapon and armour for low level players

recommendations: Completion of Nature Spirit for access to druid pouch or ouroboros pouch; alternatively, bring the required ingredients for the statue
Activated Burthorpe, Canifis, Edgeville, Falador, Karamja, Oo'glog, Port Sarim, Seers' Village, Taverley, Varrock, Ardougne and Yanille lodestone

A dramen or lunar staff, unless you have completed A Fairy Tale III - Battle at Ork's Rift
And/or Portable fairy ring

Multiple Falador teletabs or ring of respawn for continual return to Falador

Ring of life

Weapon to defend against level 95 Shadows (100 life points)
Some toad crunchies for the gnome

Food (Monkfish or a higher tier food is recommended), weapons and armour
Yew logs or better for a bonfire boost
Super set potions

recommendations: 40 Prayer for Protect from Ranged, preferably level 43 for Protect from Melee

If killing Slash Bash with ranged, Ogre Composite Bow and at least 50 Mithril brutal arrows (or better)
